description:
A man drove his car into a Mazda dealership because that was the most reasonable thing he thought to do after he was unhappy with their customer service.

NEW: Utah man drives his car through the front of a Mazda dealership just hours after purchasing the car from the same dealership.

The incident happened in Sandy, Utah, after the man was told he couldn’t return the car.

The man told the dealership that he would drive the car… pic.twitter.com/nNASSjOw0y
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg) December 10, 2024

He warned them
title: Watch: This Mazda customer was so unhappy with service, he drove his new car THROUGH the dealership

description:
Candian Green Party Leader Elizabeth May is very nervous because Trump joked that Canada would become the 51st state.


Green Party Leader Elizabeth May says Trump's jokes about Canada becoming the 51st state make her "increasingly nervous."

May adds that it's crucial not to let "Fox News or Mr. Trump's social media" exploit Canada. pic.twitter.com/8l1NeMfnE0
— Rebel News (@RebelNewsOnline) December 10, 2024


LOL. It actually was funny.

This is what they are referring to and it could not
title: Lol! Canadian leaders are freaking out that Trump may ACTUALLY make Canada the "51st state"

description:
What is the United States doing in Africa? That is unclear but according to Sleepy Joe, if we do not lead the world, what nation will? Who will pull Europe and the Middle East together? Biden has yet to answer that because he is no “wise guy!”

Warning: Lower your headphones!


Biden is randomly screaming again: "I'm not being wise guy!" pic.twitter.com/bvzjgsSP6m
— RNC Research (@RNCResearch) December 10, 2024


There are 40 days until we no longer have to listen to Joe’s rant but that feels like an
title: Biden throws public temper tantrum in one of his last senile moments as president: "I'm not being a wise guy!"

description:
For some reason, at least one idiot has to get themselves arrested during holiday cop events, and it turns out it’s often for shoplifting during “Shop with a Cop” events at Walmart.

Last year, a woman was arrested in a Michigan Walmart during the city’s “Shop with a Cop” event. While she was surrounded by 75 officers, she decided to steal over $700 worth of merchandise. This year, a similar incident happened with a man in Virginia.

A man was arrested at a Chesterfield County Walmart after he attempted to steal more than $1,000 worth of items when over 50 cops were present.
title: Watch: Man gets arrested for stealing from Walmart; he chose the the day of "Shop with a Cop" to do so

description:
The State of New York is giving residents barely a fraction of the money back that they endlessly waste, with officials claiming this is somehow supposed to offset inflation.

New York Governor Kathy Hochul unveiled two checks, one for $300 and the other for $500. The former will be given to people making up to $150,000 a year, while the latter will be given to families making up to $300,000. This comes after the state constantly spends tax dollars on the most useless things, while you have to pay a toll just for “entering the Congestion Relief Zone in Manhattan.”

New York Governor Kathy Hochul demonstrates a lack of understanding in economics. In an attempt to add
title: Watch: NY Gov wants to solve inflation... so she is giving out even MORE taxpayer dollars

description:

title: Watch: Why Does The Left Love Luigi Mangione and Hate Daniel Penny?

description:
According to Neil DeGrasse Tyson, dividing people based on sex is not the best way to promote fairness in sports, as he believes “hormone levels” are a much more effective way of determining who competes against who.


NEW: Piers Morgan rips "scientist" Neil DeGrasse Tyson after he compared gender to weight classes in wrestling and suggested sports should be divided by hormone levels.

A scientist who has this opinion has moved on from being a scientist & has turned into an activist.

Tyson: I… pic.twitter.com/KdTnwHIw1b
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg) December 7, 2024
title: Watch: Neil DeGrasse Tyson keeps embarrassing himself trying to defend trans boys competing against girls in sports

description:
For a group of people who are desperate to fix their messaging problem that repels normal Americans, the left still likes to villainize heroes while celebrating villains. Thankfully, they have CNN's Scott Jennings to help explain things slow enough for even chuckleheads like social media influencer Rep. AOC to understand.

Jennings made it easy. Daniel Penny is the GOOD guy. The UnitedHealthcare CEO killer is a bad guy.

NEW: Scott Jennings pulls out a chart in front of a CNN panel as he rips the left for their reactions to UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson’s execution.

“Let me just help you understand if you're on the American left tonight.”

“The good guy today, Daniel Penny.”

“The bad guy,… pic.twitter.
title: Watch: Scott Jennings whips out a chart to explain to progressives Daniel Penny "good," CEO Killer "bad"

description:
